price: Kad se u lađe ukrcaju, iskreno se mole Allahu. A kad ih On do kopna dovede, odjednom druge Njemu ravnim smatraju,
arabic: فَإِذَا رَكِبُواْ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ إِذَا هُمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā rakibū fī al-ful'ki daʿawū al-laha mukh'liṣīna lahu al-dīna falammā najjāhum ilā al-bari idhā hum yush'rikūna
